import React, { Component } from "react"; import './secondpage.css'; import Poster from './poster.js' import PosterSample from './postersamples.js' import exportedposters from './App.js' import doggo from './img/doggo.jpg'; // import {Rectangle, Circle, Ellipse, Line, Polyline, CornerBox, Triangle} from 'react-shapes'; const ii1 = require('./img/doggo.jpg') const ii2 = require('./img/poster1.jpg') const ii3 = require('./img/poster2.jpg') const ii4 = require('./img/poster3.jpeg') const ii5 = require('./img/poster4.jpeg') const ii6 = require('./img/poster5.jpeg') const ii7 = require('./img/poster6.jpg') const ii8 = require('./img/poster7.jpg') const ii9 = require('./img/poster8.jpeg') const ii10 = require('./img/poster9.jpeg') class SecondPage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { parray: exportedposters, clickedposter: ii6 } this.handleSelection = this.handleSelection.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { console.log(this.props) console.log(this.state) } handleSelection() { this.setState({ clickedposter: ii2 }); } render() { return (
this.setState({ clickedposter: this.props.importedposter }) } /> this.setState({ clickedposter: this.props.importedposter }) } /> this.setState({ clickedposter: this.props.importedposter }) } />
